name: ngx-smart-loading
description: A service for tracking the status of asynchronous tasks (for example, the status of requests to the server)

scripts.lib:pack: npm run lib:build && ls &&  cd ../../dist/ngx-smart-loading && npm pack
scripts.lib:publish: npm run lib:build --configuration=production && cd ../../dist/ngx-smart-loading && npm pack && npm publish

keywords: Service with RxJS for track loading
Tracking the download status for multiple requests
